CWEs: CWE-915: Improperly Controlled Modification of Dynamically-Determined Object Attributes
vulnerabilities: Uncontrolled Modification of Object Prototype Attributes ('Prototype Pollution')
description: The function 'unique_name_575' is vulnerable to Prototype Pollution because it dynamically modifies object attributes without proper validation. This can allow an attacker to modify the prototype of 'Object' which could lead to application-wide changes that can result in Denial of Service (DoS), Remote Code Execution (RCE), or other serious security vulnerabilities.
